# 1 Fathom Sportfishing Charters

## Business
- Name: 1 Fathom Sportfishing Charters
- Type: Fishing charter service
- Location: Jensen Beach, Florida (Treasure Coast)
- Service area: Jensen Beach, Stuart, Fort Pierce, Jupiter, Vero Beach, and surrounding areas
- Captain: Captain CJ
- Contact: (412) 979-4505 | salugac@gmail.com
- Website: https://onefathomfishing.com

## Services
### Trip Types
1. 4 Hour Inshore Fishing - $400 (year-round)
2. 6 Hour Inshore Fishing - $550 (year-round)
3. 4 Hour Nearshore Fishing - $450 (seasonal: April 1 - September 1)
4. 6 Hour Offshore/Nearshore - $600 (seasonal: April 1 - September 1)

### What's Included
- All rods, reels, and tackle
- Live bait (when available)
- Fishing license
- Catch cleaning and filleting
- Water bottles
- Ice box

## Boat
- Type: 20' NauticStar bay boat
- Equipment: GPS and fishfinder
- Features: Live bait well, wireless trolling motor, ice box
- Capacity: Up to 3 guests comfortably

## Policies
- Cancellation: Free cancellation up to 3 days before trip date
- Kids welcome (5+ recommended)
- Life jackets required for children under 6
- You keep your catch (check harvest limits with captain)
- Pickup may be included based on location

## Launch Locations
- Jensen Beach
- Fort Pierce
- Stuart
- Jupiter
- Vero Beach
